name: 3D Monster Truck Smash Parking - Nitro Car Crush Arena Simulator Game PRO
name_original: 3D Monster Truck Smash Parking - Nitro Car Crush Arena Simulator Game PRO
description: Monster Truck Madness! Complete Arena challenges in dozens of maps.  Drive through the stadium doing jumps and hitting all the rings.  Park at the end of the stage to clear.  Collect coins along the way to buy upgrades for your monster truck.  5 different trucks await you to race.  It's a crazy thrill so grab it today.
